step.desc: check stp instance 0 status on cisco
check stp instance 5 status on cisco
check stp instance 21 status on cisco
check stp instance 0 status on cisco
check stp instance 5 status on cisco
check stp instance 21 status on cisco

step.ssh:
-v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "ah_ixia_connect -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -tclServerIP ${pri.tclserver.ip} -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port},${sw1.port2.ixia_port},${sw1.port3.ixia_port},${sw1.port4.ixia_port} -phyList ${sw1.port1.phytype},${sw1.port2.phytype},${sw1.port3.phytype},${sw1.port4.phytype}" -v ""
-v "traffic_configure_eth2 -portListIn ${ixia.port1},${ixia.port2},${ixia.port3},${ixia.port4} -mac_dst ffff.ffff.ffff -mac_dst_count 1 -mac_src ${ixia.port4.mac} -mac_src_count 1024 -vlan disable -eth2_protocol ${stream1.etype} -frame_length 64 -udf_offset ${stream1.UDFoffset} -udf_value 0xBDBDBDBD -rate_pps 256 -patternOffset2 ${stream1.patternOffset2} -rxPattern 0xBDBDBDBD" -v ""
-v "stream_transmit_method_set -portList ${ixia.port4} -streamId 1 -transmitMethod stopStream -numBursts 4 -numFrames 256"
-v "after 60000" -v "start_transmit -portList ${ixia.port4} -firstTryFlag false" -v "after 6000"
-v "get_statistic -txPortList ${ixia.port4} -rxPortList ${ixia.port1},${ixia.port2},${ixia.port3}"
-v "check_equal_tx_with_rx -oneTxPort ${ixia.port4} -oneRxPort ${ixia.port1}" -v "check_equal_tx_with_rx -oneTxPort ${ixia.port4} -oneRxPort ${ixia.port2}" -v "check_equal_tx_with_rx -oneTxPort ${ixia.port4} -oneRxPort ${ixia.port3}" -v "ctrl-c"

check mac address learned on dut1

check mac address leared on dut3

clear mac-address all and check mac-address table on dut4

check tx and rx result on rxport2

check tx and rx result on ixia.port2

check tx and rx result on rxport:ixia.port4

step.multi-setvar: echo sendall=$(/opt/Mainline/bin/getbyrexp.py -f ${log.dir}/step6.6.3.log -p 'cmp1 is (\d+)' -t str) echo receive=$(/opt/Mainline/bin/getbyrexp.py -f ${log.dir}/step6.6.3.log -p 'cmp2 is (\d+)' -t str)

set mac idle timeout with default

ixia1 send frames to ixia4 for 5 minutes

src-mac is multicast, shouldn't be learned
